Title: Relates to affidavits of the lawful immigration status of certain students; repealer
Summary: Removes the affidavit of the lawful immigration status requirement for certain students.
LawCode: Rpld §661 sub 5 ¶a cl ¶, ¶b cl ¶, §6301 sub 5 sec undesig ¶, §6455 sub 2 ¶(a) cl ¶, sub 3 ¶(a) cl ¶, amd §6206, Ed L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the education law, in relation to affidavits of the lawful immigration status of certain students; and to repeal certain provisions of such law relating thereto
